# Check this formula and the values from model output

```{r}
getAIC <- function(n, L){
  return(2*length(n)-(2*-L))
}
```

```{r}
arr_t_vec <- c(146.6, 124.8, 118.4)
resource <- c(0.1, 0.5, 1)
df <- tibble(arr_t=arr_t_vec,
             resource=resource)

ggplot(df,aes(x=arr_t_vec, y=resource)) + geom_line()
ggplot(df,aes(x=arr_t_vec, y=log(resource))) + geom_line()

```
